attributes.action: change the law regarding knife and firearms, the minimum sentence for carrying a knife without reasonable reason to be 5 years imprisonment, and, the carrying of a firearm without reasonable reason to be 15 years imprisonment. The petitioners request that the Prime Minister ask the Secretary of State for Justice and the Lord Chancellor to take the necessary action to make the change in the law possible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
